text:
Created attachment 30047
adds overlay setting to chart legend

This patch adds the ability to set overlay on the chart legend.

It also set overlay = false by default. This is what Excel does. Is that the right thing to do?
creator: martin.andersson@purplescout.se
cedric.walter@gmail.com
text:
patch reviewed, one testcase added to assert excel default behavior overlay = false

merged in trunk revision 1539169
